Description of incident: The Office of The Clerk/Treasurer for the City of Burlington informed individuals that their names and Social Security numbers were inadvertently left unredacted as part of the individuals request for a tax abatement that was provided to the Burlington Board of Tax Abatement (which is made up of the City Council, Mayor and CIty Assessor).The information was part of a clickable agenda item that was posted on the City Council's website on January 9, 2014, the information was redacted on January 13, 2014.Those affected with questions can call Bob Rusten, Chief Administrative Officer at 1-802-865-7000.
